CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 14, 1956, pg. 4 reads: "Honored - Charles Garfinkel, officer-in-charge of the local Immigration and Naturalization Service of the U.S. Justice Department, honors Thomas Sumpter for eleven years of outstanding service by pinning on Sumpter a gold lapel button. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Charles Garfinkel presenting certificate to Thomas Sumpter in recognition for outstanding government service
